atk-s0402a58:1_0: 221-231. Tatiyassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāneva. Dasame yo cintetvā kabyaṁ karoti,
atk-s0402a58:1_1: ayaṁ cintākavi nāma. Yo sutvā karoti, ayaṁ sutakavi nāma. Yo ekaṁ atthaṁ nissāya
atk-s0402a58:1_2: karoti, ayaṁ atthakavi nāma. Yo taṅkhaṇaññeva vaṅgīsatthero viya attano paṭibhānena
